Mimi Cherono Ng'ok (a mụrụ n'afọ 1983) bụ onye Kenya na-ese foto, bi na Nairobi. "Foto ya bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ pụtara ihe nke ahụmịhe na mmetụta uche na-apụta site na ndụ ya n'ime njem ". E gosipụtara ọrụ Ng'ok na Hayward Gallery, Berlin Biennale, Carnegie International na African Photography Encounters, ma emere ya na Walther Collection.
Ng'ok tolitere n'ime ime obodo dị na Nairobi, Kenya. N'afọ 2006, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BFA na Michaelis School of Fine Art na Mahadum Cape Town na South Africa.

Usoro ya nke afọ 2008  bụ I am Home, na ndị mbịarambịa Afrịka bi na South Africa, na-ekwu maka "nsogbu nke ụlọ, mbugharị, ọnwụ, na njirimara". Ọrụ malitere n'afọ 2013, nke emere na mba ebe o biri ma  ebe ome gasịrị njem, Alexandra Genova kọwara ya na Time dị ka "usoro ihe ngosi banyere ncheta, ọnwụ na agụụ mmekọahụ kpughere site na ahụmịhe Ng'ok"

N'iburu n'uche na Ng'ok kwenyere na ụlọ abụghị ebe, kama ọ bụ ọnọdụ uche, Genova dere na ọrụ ahụ "na-enyocha oge a site na njikọ nke ndị mmadụ na ebe obibi". Diane Smyth na British Journal of Photography kọwara ọrụ Ng'ok na ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Africa State of Mind dị ka inye "nkọwa onwe onye nke ebe obibi, n'ụzọ dị iche na ebumnuche doro anya nke foto ihe nkiri".

Emere Everyone is lonely in Kigali na Dakar, Accra, Berlin, Abidjan, Kampala, Kigali, Nairobi na Johannesburg ma na-agụnye isiokwu ya a na-ejikarị eme ihe: osisi, ebe okpomọkụ, ịnyịnya na ihe okpụkpụ nwoke a na-amaghị. Emere usoro Do You Miss Me? Sometimes, Not Always, ihe karịrị ọnwa isii mgbe Ọktoba 2014, n'obodo Kigali, Abidjan, Kampala, na Nairobi iji cheta enyi ya Thabiso Sekgala, onye nwụrụ anwụ.
